name: GKStrategist
desc: A general interface for objects that provide artificial intelligence for use in turn-based (and similar) games.

items.name: var gameModel: GKGameModel?
items.desc: The model representing the current state of the game.

items.name: var randomSource: GKRandom?
items.desc: A randomizer object to be used when the strategist randomly selects a move.

items.name: func bestMoveForActivePlayer() -> GKGameModelUpdate?
items.desc: Computes and returns the best possible move for the current player.
